Meaning.Definition: كَرَّسَ كَرَّسَ الْبِنَاءَ : He founded a building. كُرْسِىٌّ : A throne, syn. With سَرِيْرٌ ; chair كَرَاسِىُّ plural.
Meaning.Example: Token(38:35:4:6) It is the place or seat of the king (38:35)
Token(2:256:4:6) In this verse it signifies "Dominion" and "power" of God, whereby He holds the heavens and the earth; knowledge.

Meaning.Definition: Also means seat of the learned man
Meaning.Example: هُوَ مِنَ الْكَرَاسِىِّ orمِنْ اَهْلِ الْكُرْسِىِّ : He is of the learned men.
